Meaning: Weekday number - Monday  =1,... Sunday =7

Meaning: Values between 0 and 23 (0 = one hour starting at 00:00)

Meaning: Holds secular holidays, includes days such as labour day, each hour of the day is coded as one
Holds religious holidays, includes religious holidays such as Christmas. each hour of the day is coded as one
Holds sports events includes days where major sports events take place - choice of events ad days are based on national TV-watching statistics
Holds TV and media events includes days where major non-sports activities take place - choice of events ad days are based on national TV-watching statistics
holds 'extreme' days, indicating days when 'extreme' weather or infrastructure breakdown creates transport-chaos
